liven up.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to become more exciting, or to make an event become more exciting
liven up.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The party really livened up when Mattie arrived.
Why don’t we invite Jane? That’ll liven things up!
liven up.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to make something look, taste etc more interesting
liven up.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Why not liven up the room with some flowers?
liven up.translation[0].definitions[2].d: to become more interested or excited, or to make someone feel like this
liven up.translation[0].definitions[2].e: After a few drinks she livened up a little.
